about_the_game:
There is a thin line between our perception of reality and reality itself. In a strange twist, the perception of ordinary human beings is corrupting reality, creating beings known as Distortions. These Distortions commonly appear in places where the human psyche is at its breaking point, and the stress generated by this phenomenon manifests as strange objects and dangerous creatures. A long-term, mysterious company named Intersection claims to have the solution. By selecting a few individuals capable of perceiving and dealing with Distortions, they can keep the threat to a minimum.

PLAN YOUR STEPS

Never go blindly into the darkness. Take your time to plan each step, understand the map, and gather every item you might need. Each objective is in a different room, so use the security systems to open the doors and turn on the lights in the rooms you need, but be careful with energy usage. Using the Proximity Voice Chat, you can talk freely with your partner and make the best strategy.

ACCESS SECURITY FOOTAGE OF CCTV CAMERAS

Access the footage of several security cameras spread over the level using the security computer in the main room. From there, you can check if a route is free from danger or locate anomalies to capture later. If a creature is lurking in places you want to go, you can use the sound system to lure them to another location. When playing with a friend, you can also guide them to the desired place in safety.

COMPLETE SIMPLE TASKS OR FIX COMPLEX SYSTEMS

The Distortions attach themselves to objects that have caused distress to someone. Depending on the difficulty of the contract you accept, you will have to do simple tasks like organizing boxes or complex ones like fixing electrical systems that will require advanced information. Don't worry! Intersection always sends a manual explaining how to do your job.

BUY NEW EQUIPMENT

Equip yourself with the best items in the store and be prepared for more dangerous jobs and creatures. Sometimes it's best to have an extra plier or a more potent flashlight just in case.

Features

  • Single and coop play: The game is designed differently for single-player adventurers or teams that want to die together.

  • Multiple difficulty levels: Choose the mission that better suits your skills or items at the moment.

  • Progressive Gameplay: Even the most ordinary task will help you in future missions.

  • Hunt: Not all horror games give you the task of hunting the evil creature.

name: Hired 2 Die

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700 / AMD Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 / AMD Radeon RX 7600 - 8GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Hired 2 Die is a cooperative horror game for 1 to 4 players. Terrifying monsters haunt your workplace. Study them using the security system, survive by remembering that every change is permanent, and capture them with precise planning. Most importantly, finish your job.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
